ASTEROIDS [PRINCE]

by Russ Prince

Released Apr 10, 2001
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

A bunch of asteroids are floating around… Shoot them. With the occasional flying saucer coming around to kill you. The ship is always in center screen. When you thrust, everything around you moves instead. The background scrolls in the direction of your movement to help you see how fast your moving. Asteroids clone by Russ Prince.
